fullplot: With his family away for their annual summer holiday, New Yorker Richard Sherman decides he has the opportunity to live a bachelor's life - to eat and drink what he wants and basically to enjoy life without wife and son. The beautiful but ditsy blond from the apartment above his catches his eye and they soon start spending time together. It's all innocent though there is little doubt that Sherman is attracted to her. Any lust he may be feeling is played out in his own imagination however.
plot: When his family goes away for the summer, a so far faithful husband is tempted by a beautiful neighbor.
title: The Seven Year Itch
writers: George Axelrod (based upon an original play: "The Seven Year Itch")
